main event: Witnesses observed a lighted, cigar-shaped object in the sky that moved in an erratic pattern, with periods of acceleration and hovering.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes before the object disappeared., The object was described as large and white., There were two locations involved: Kittery Point, Maine and East Nassau, New York., Reports were collected on February 7, 1957., The object was captured in two photographs, one appearing to show it partially submerged in snow.
location: Kittery Point, Maine/ East Nassau, New York, USA
